verbs.description: In the April 30 USA Today article , " [ARG0: John Kelly] [V: says] [ARG1: reports he called Trump ' an idiot ' are ' total BS] , ' " the White House chief of staff is quoted saying , " I am committed to the president , his agenda and our country .
